completions.nl_description: Recolor all objects that are neighbors of any color X object to the same color as the X object.
Recolor all objects of color X to color based on the initial color of the column they are in.
Change the color of all objects from X to F, and change the color of all objects from O to the color of the nearest object.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Change the color of objects neighboring blue objects to their respective color: R -> F, B -> Y, and G -> B.
Recolor every place the object of color X appears, with the color of the next neighboring object in the same column.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Recolor all objects that intersection with the grid's main diagonal to different colors.
Recolor all objects of color X to match the color of their neighboring objects.
Replace color of all the objects of color X with the color of the first object below the X object.
Recolor all objects of color X to different colors.
Recolor all objects of color X to F.
Recolor all objects of color R, F, or C to color of X's neighboring objects respectively.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter
            (and
                (or
                    (or
                        (color_equals (color_of this) R)
                        (color_equals (color_of this) F))
                    (color_equals (color_of this) C))
                (neighbor_of this other)
            )
        )
        (apply
            (update_color (color_of other))
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Recolor all objects of color X to color of the neighboring objects.
Recolor all X objects to the color of their neighboring objects.
Recolor cell groupings in the output according to the colors of the groupings in the input grid.
Recolor all objects of color X to the color of their neighboring object.
Recolor all objects of color X to color F.
Recolor all objects of color X to the color of an adjacent object.
Recolor all objects to color R.
Recolor all objects of color different than X based on the row index of their highest neighbor of color X.
Recolor all instances of color X to match the color of an object that is their immediate neighbor.
Recolor all objects to the color of their neighboring object.
Recolor all objects to match the color of the object in the same row and adjacent column on the right.
Recolor the objects of color X to match the colors of their neighboring object of size greater than 1.
Recolor all objects of color X to the color of their neighboring objects.
Move all objects of color different than X, towards the object of color X if they are neighbors of it, and update their colors to their respective new colors.
Recolor all objects originally colored X to the color of an adjacent object.
Recolor all objects of color X to their adjacent object's color.
Recolor all objects of color X to color corresponding to the nearest neighbor color.
Recolor all objects of color X with the color of neighboring objects.
Recolor all objects which are neighbors of object of color 'X' to their own initial colors.
completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (neighbor_of this other)) (apply (update_color (color_of this)))))

completions.nl_description: Recolor all X objects to the color corresponding to their neighboring object's color.
Recolor all objects with the color Y
Recolor objects of color X to color of non-adjacent maximum size objects
Recolor all objects adjacent to color X with the color found on the left side objects of X
Update colors of all objects that are four-by-four and lie diagonally from each other but not touching each other, respectively, to colors of their first columns.
Recolor all objects of size 2 to the color of the maximum-sized neighboring object.
Recolor all objects in the grid to the color of the object of color X, towards it if they are neighbors.
Recolor to fuchsia all objects of color X that are neighbors to the objects of color different than X.
Recolor all the objects to the color of the neighboring object with color X.
Recolor objects of color X to the color of their neighboring object if other object exists.
Recolor all objects to the color of the largest object on the grid.
Recolor all objects of color X to color R
Recolor all objects of color X to color different than X
Recolor all objects of size 8 to color of their neighbor objects.
Recolor all objects of color X to color F.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (color_equals (color_of this) X))
        (apply (update_color F))
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Recolor all objects of color X to F and all objects of size 3 to R.
Change the color of the objects that neighbor an object of size 8 to the color of the smallest neighboring object.
Recolor all objects of color X to the color of their neighboring cell in the same object.
Recolor all X objects to a color based on their neighbors: R if neighboring R, F if neighboring F, A if neighboring A, C if neighboring C, B if neighboring B, or Y if neighboring Y.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it, and recolor them.
Recolor all objects of color X to color F
Recolor the objects adjacent to the grey object to a different color.
Recolor objects of size 8 to B, and objects of size 12 to F, retaining their structure.
Recolor all objects of color X to color matching the neighboring maximum-sized object's color.
Recolor all objects of color X to their surrounding object colors.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects neighboring X cells toward the object X maximally.
Recolor all objects of color X to the color of neighboring objects.
Recolor all the objects of shape 'enclosed' to match the color of the first enclosed object.
Recolor all objects of size 8 to color of the object of maximum size.
Recolor all objects to match the color of the nearest object with the size of at least 3, keeping their sizes and shapes the same.
Recolor all objects of color different than X to the color of one of their neighboring objects.
Extend all objects of color different than X toward the object of color X, without overlapping.
Recolor all objects inside a filled rectangle with color Y.
Recolor all the objects that are neighbors of another object
Recolor all objects to the color of the first object of maximum size they touch.
Extend only the red objects towards the fuchsia objects if they are neighbors of each other, without overlapping.
Recolor all objects of color X to either B, R, or F depending on adjacent colors.
Recolor objects of color X to different colors based on their shapes and maintain their relative positions.
Recolor all objects of color X to the color of their neighboring object, if they have a neighbor.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Recolor all objects of color X to match their neighbors' colors, if applicable.
Recolor all objects of color X to the color corresponding to the left neighboring object.
Recolor all objects of color X to respective colors of neighboring objects.
Recolor all X colored objects and their neighbors to color matching the original object if they are neighbors.
completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (color_equals (color_of other) X) (neighbor_of this other))) (apply (update_color (color_of this)))))

completions.nl_description: Recolor all objects that are neighbors of objects of color X, with the color of the neighbor.
Recolor all objects of color X to color associated with their neighboring objects.
Change color of all objects of color X to the color of their neighbor object.
Recolor all objects to the same color as the adjacent neighbor objects enclosing them.
Recolor all objects to match the color of the largest object in their respective grids.
Recolor all objects of color X to F, R, B respectively.
Recolor all objects to the color of the leftmost neighbor.
completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (neighbor_of this other) (column_equals (column_of this) (column_of other)))) (apply (update_color (color_of other)))))

completions.nl_description: Recolor all objects of color X to color F
For each color different than O, update its color to the color of the object adjacent to it that shares the same diagonal symmetry.
Recolor all objects of color X to the color of the nearest object they border, while extending the nearest object's color.
Recolor all objects of color X to the color of the object they are neighboring.
Recolor all objects of size 8 to Fuchsia.
Recolor objects within or surrounded by objects of color X to have the same color.
completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (neighbor_of this other) (color_equals (color_of other) X))) (apply (update_color (color_of other)))))

completions.nl_description: Recolor the odd columns of objects with color X based on the color of neighboring objects.
Recolor all objects to match the color of the diagonal line of X.
Recolor all objects to the neighboring object's color if both are not color O and one of them is color X.
Recolor all objects within the rectangle formed by the largest object on the grid to color F
Recolor all objects to match the color of the neighboring object of color X.
Move neighbor objects of color different than X towards the object of color X, then recolor them to the color of object X.
Recolor all objects to their neighbor's color if they are the same shape as the neighbor.
Recolor all objects of color X to color F.
Recolor all objects of color X to F.
Move all objects with color different than X and recolor them to the color of the object located at the same grid space as the current object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
